#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(void){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        string s;
        cin >> s;
        map <char,int> m;
        int l=s.size();
        int i,c = 0,v;
        for(i = 0; i < l; i++)
        m[s[i]]++;
        map <char,int> :: iterator it;
        for(it = m.begin(); it != m.end(); it++){
            v = it->second;
            if(v%2 == 0)
                c+=v/2;
            else
                c+=v/2+1;
        }
        cout<< c <<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
